message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a steal at $20,000. I know you'll love it!
Alice, I appreciate your offer but $20,000 is way above my budget. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product, let's make a deal!
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $20,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $18,000. This is my final offer.
Alice,  $18,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm happy to pay $15,000, which is a fair price considering I'm your only customer at this point. Let's make this happen!
